description:
After fixing the bug https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/1394606 some pylint jobs are still failing due to timeout. It seems that the default 30 minutes is not enough in some cases. 

For example https://jenkins06.openstack.org/job/gate-nova-pylint/5435/console 

See more on http://logstash.openstack.org/#
title: pylint job times out on gate

comments.content:
After fixing the bug https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/1394606 some pylint jobs are still failing due to timeout. It seems that the default 30 minutes is not enough in some cases. 

For example https://jenkins06.openstack.org/job/gate-nova-pylint/5435/console 

See more on http://logstash.openstack.org/#
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~balazs-gibizer

comments.content: That seems to contradict with the fact that the fix for https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/1394606 got merged less than a day ago.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~balazs-gibizer

comments.content: pylint has been removed with this change https://review.openstack.org/#/c/136846/
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~balazs-gibizer
